member.summary: Gets or sets the repository owner (username or organization).

member.summary: Navigation property to the notification status.

member.summary: Navigation property to associated GitHub issues (many-to-many via junction table).

member.summary: GitHub issue ID (from GitHub.Issues database or GitHub API).

member.summary: Gets or sets when the system started.

member.summary: Gets or sets how the system shut down.

member.summary: Gets or sets which application was focused when dictating (optional).

member.summary: Represents the phase of an agent message in a task workflow.

member.summary: Agent is starting work on a task.

member.name: F:VirtualAssistant.Data.Enums.MessagePhase.Complete
member.summary: Task is complete with final summary.

member.name: T:VirtualAssistant.Data.Enums.NotificationStatusEnum
member.summary: Enum representing all possible notification statuses in the workflow. Values match the Id in NotificationStatus reference table.

member.name: F:VirtualAssistant.Data.Enums.NotificationStatusEnum.NewlyReceived
member.summary: Notification just received from agent, waiting to be processed.

member.name: F:VirtualAssistant.Data.Enums.NotificationStatusEnum.Processing
member.summary: VirtualAssistant picked up the notification for processing.

member.name: F:VirtualAssistant.Data.Enums.NotificationStatusEnum.Announced
member.summary: User was notified about pending notifications (e.g., "You have 4 new messages").

member.name: F:VirtualAssistant.Data.Enums.NotificationStatusEnum.WaitingForPlayback
member.summary: Waiting for user to decide whether to play the notification.

member.name: F:VirtualAssistant.Data.Enums.NotificationStatusEnum.Played
member.summary: Notification was played to the user.
